From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Jump to: navigation, search

**" It All Started with a Beer"** is a song recorded by American [country
music](/wiki/Country_music "Country music") artist [Frankie
Ballard](/wiki/Frankie_Ballard "Frankie Ballard"). It was released in November
2015 as the first single from Ballard's third studio album, _[El
Rio](/wiki/El_R%C3%ADo_\(album\) "El Río \(album\)")_.[1] The song was written
by [Jaren Johnston](/wiki/Jaren_Johnston "Jaren Johnston"), Neil Mason and
[Jeremy Stover](/wiki/Jeremy_Stover "Jeremy Stover").[2]
